Summary: UFO flying slowly down the street.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Newport
There were no other sightings in Newport on or around July 7th 1972
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was the summer of 1972. On Niagra st. Navy housing, NewPort R.I. I was sitting on the stairs in front of my house with a group of friends. There were alot of people sitting outside their stairs on that cool night around 7:00 pm. I looked up and so did everyone else on that street. There was a ufo just flying slowly right down the middle of the street. About 80 feet up. I ran in the house to get my mother. She came outside and said I believe in ufos but not little green men. My brother and I chased after it. It stopped and then a flame shot out from under. It went straight up. It was round and gray, with two longated windows. It had an entena on top.
